cause.description:
Ok, So i know you've seen the pictures, Read the articals, and heard the rumors! Some True... Some Very False! Anyways... WE all love Britney! You've danced to Toxic! You've warn the School Girl outfit! You've done some lude act to Slave 4 U.... WE WANT OUR IDOL BACK!!!
So FUCK K-FED FUCK The Tabloids FUCK the Paparazzi FUCK PEREZ FUCK ALL THE HATERS!!!!
WE WANT BRINTEY BACK!!!! NOW!!!!
1. Britney Is Only human and makes Mistakes
2. Britney Can't sing... But she's Flawless at what she does
3. You know EVERYone Loves some part of her... LIKE IT OR NOT!
cause.mission: To Ensure That Our Idol will SHINE again!!!
cause.name: Support Britney's Comeback!
